Room.Name: Entrance to the Barbarian Pits
Room.ShortDescription: Welcome to the Barbarian Pits, just north of the City of Oceancrest.
Room.LongDescription: Society, deeming the barbarians as just too barbaric, has set aside this small park to the east of the Northern Highway as a place reserved only for their use. Here, the barbarian culture is nurtured and passed down through the generations instead of simply being forgotten, as was done in the past before they moved here. Not particularly happy with their small park, the barbarians are still content enough to stay here and not overrun the city to the south.
